title: Embroidery, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk on cotton
Technique: chain stitch embroidery
description: Cream-colored cotton (possibly from a curtain or skirt) with detached floral motives worked in chain stitch. Flowers small garden varieties in clusters 3" to 4" long; arranged in staggered rows. Shading used in some blossoms. Right selvage present.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidery, late 18th century.Medium: silk on cotton
Technique: chain stitch embroidery. 1950-16-4.
